tool_description: Calculate and integrate travel carbon emission climate data into your products and services.
name: Travel CO2 - Climate Carbon Emissions
title: Travel CO2 - Climate Carbon Emissions

api_list.name: /api/v1/simpletrips
api_list.description: Find trip emission data by sending simple trip data requests with from, to, transport_types, ways and number of people. This endpoint uses two DISCOVERY-steps per request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-co2-climate-carbon-emissions.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/simpletrips"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-co2-climate-carbon-emissions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/v1/trips
api_list.description: Find trip emission data by sending trips with steps with one location, one accommodation and/or one transport to the next step.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-co2-climate-carbon-emissions.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/trips"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-co2-climate-carbon-emissions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/v1/accommodation
api_list.description: Find accommodation emission data by querying with accommodation type, number of nights and number of people.

api_list.name: /api/v1/transport
api_list.description: Find transport emission data by querying with distance, vehicle and number of people.
